outputs.output_descr:
Project Objective: 

To transform the market for energy-efficiency in buildings and appliances in Cape Verde by introducing a new law on building codes and for domestic appliances by introducing a labeling programme, import procedures, testing procedures, and certification in such a manner as to lead to significant improvements in energy-efficiency.

project_descr: Removing Barriers to Energy-Efficiency in the Cape Verdean Built Environment and for Appliances
project_title: Removing Barriers to Energy Eficiency in Cape Verde
